name: Blocks (itch) (AY2020)
description:
This is a game that centers around a red cube, with the ability to change the dimension it moves around in - from isometric 3d to 2d - to a new dimension. There are 5 levels with different challenging yet intriguing puzzles, along with a brief story to go along with them. The levels start challenging - and get to be very hard!

  • Progress is saved - along with the score you get on each level
  • Only for windows for now, leave a comment if you want me to make a mac or different version, it's not hard to do so
  • To anybody who downloaded the game - Thank you!
